main event: UFO sighting reported by Coast Guard personnel at Cape Hatteras Beach, N.C.
interesting points: The object appeared as a bright white light with flashing red and green lights on either side,The sighting was made using 7 x 50 power binoculars from a 50-foot high tower,Weather conditions were unusually clear, allowing for excellent visibility,The observers were able to see the object for approximately 30 minutes,The light ship near the site was confirmed to have running lights matching the sighted object's description.
sighted object: one round star-like object with bright white light and flashing red and green lights
witness description: US Coast Guard personnel stationed at Ocracoke Coast Guard Station
